title: (x) Goodwood Revival - Gill Sans, Profil, Bodoni, FF Zapata {Nicolai, Mike Y, Raph, Mark S}
content:
The stunning Goodwood Revival programme that I picked up on Sunday...   
   
 ![GW1](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125755im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48485.jpg)   
 ![GW2](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125755im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48486.jpg)   
 ![GW3](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125755im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48487.jpg)   
 ![GW4](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125755im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48488.jpg)   
   
Any ideas... or any typefaces along a similar theme...   
   
   
   
James
author: jcarruthers

comments.content:
[Gill Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125755/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gill-sans/) is used for text   
The Sussex Trophy looks like [Poster Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125755/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/poster-bodoni/)

The '07' numeral in the first picture is ['Profil'](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125755/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?PREFS_SET%5BRenderSize%5D=36&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=07&search%5Btext%5D=Profil).

Not all Bodonii are created equal: the actual cutting is [Monotype Bodoni Ultra Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125755/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=205265). Note the curved counter on the 'e', yet the sharp serif on 'x' and 'y'.

Cheers guys!   
   
How about the "black jack" text?
